data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Ma`an.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ma‘an, Jordan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Ma`an to agree with you and with one another.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ma‘an, Jordan.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Ma`an who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Ma‘an, Jordan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Ma`an prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 323 believers in Ma`an that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ma‘an, Jordan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Ma`an
location.cities_list: Ma‘an, Wādī Mūsá, Aţ Ţayyibah, Al Jafr, Ash Shawbak
